attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Give back authority and respect to teachers.  Re-introduce caning at our schools across Britain.

Give parents the right to discipline their children as well using corporal punishment.

Introduce caning to the judiciary system so that caning can be meted out as part of the sentencing procedures on youth and the youth too young to be dealt with in other ways.

Children in Britain have lost all respect for authority and their elders, re-introducing caning and corporal punishment will greatly assist in restoring our youth to a more respectful manner of behaviour.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
